# Tutorials

Welcome to the tutorials for **fault_injector**!

## Available Tutorials

Coming soon:
- Getting started (basic):
    - generate data
    - set up injector object
    - examples of all the fault options

- Getting started using dataframe injector:
    - set up injector object
    - examples of all the fault options

- using open-source sensor dataset
    - demonstrate increasing fault magnitude over time

- using fault_injection.inject_fault to inject custom fault
